description: Werner Baumann said that his German company's $62 billion bid for Monsanto would most likely pass regulatory scrutiny. The deal would yield a giant in the business of crop seeds and pesticides.
title: Bayer Chief on Mega-Merger With Monsanto
title_page: Bayer Chief on Mega-Merger With Monsanto - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Werner Baumann said that his German company's $62 billion bid for Monsanto would most likely pass regulatory scrutiny. The deal would yield a giant in the business of crop seeds and pesticides.
